Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I have loads of mods and I see contracts about doing things in high or low (e.g. Mun) orbit. Is there a definitive list of what constitutes "high" or "low" for each body?

Best regards,

Sam
You can send a probe to an excentric eliptical orbit around the target body and do some scientific measurements on different sections of the orbit to explore and answer that question yourself.
There is in the wiki
Thanks @UmbralRaptor, perfect! I was looking at the individual planetoid pages and this information isn't listed.
